note: I draw stuff, usually dumb self-indulgent/self inserting pap with cute dumb animu. she/her

name: Art
value: Of the most ridiculously self indulgent escapism

name: Escapism
value: The recognition of the terrors of our world and the related desire to gtfo; lacking an actual destination to flee to, one retreats inwards. Probably a bad impulse.

name: Impulse
value: Turn it towards fellowship and away from selfish solpsism. I am not good at this.
